reviews.title: Jergens always the best!
reviews.review_text: I have been having issues with dry elbows, living in AZ this happens often. I wanted to try this lotion because we have always used Jergens, but I love the smell of coconut and that is why I purchased this lotion. It really helps with dry skin and after a shower I put it on my legs and feet and it feels great. Very good lotion I will buy it again.
This is my first time getting the coconut.And I really enjoyed the scent. dragon leaves my skin feeling really soft and moisturized for the entire day.
It smells amazing but never irritates my very sensitive skin the way most scented lotions do. It's quite lightweight and not greasy, and leaves my skin feeling super soft.

reviews.title: Need help with dry skin?
reviews.review_text: I love how it feels. It definitely keeps my skin moisturized and it lasts a long time. a little bit goes a long way. this is one of the few name brand items I purchase and I love it!

reviews.title: Great lotion
reviews.review_text: I love jergens lotion especially the hydrating coconut, it has a light scent, not greasy feeling. Goes on smooth and lasts. Leaves my skin feeling great! And I am picky about my lotions!

reviews.title: Smells amazing, not a perfumy smell
reviews.review_text: I have been buying this for many years, mainly because it smells so great. I can't use most scented products, but this is mild and smells natural. Good value, good moisturizer, but not the best for winter.
This is the only lotion I use for daily moisturizing. I love coconut scent and it's a light scent that is just perfect. Skin moisture lasts all day.

reviews.title: Consistently Good
reviews.review_text: Jergen's consistently has a good product. The coconut smell is good and it doesn't leave skin feeling oily.

I was very happy with the lotion on one of my deliveries, but my last delivery was very poor since I only got two items of the 17 items that I ordered. The other 15 items that I received were somebody else's order. I wasn't too happy about that. I'm now going to have to check each bag before the driver leaves to make sure I received my order correctly.
i have tough skin so for me it doesn't work as good to someone who has soft sking already and wants to keep it that way. It goes to the old saying use what works for you.

reviews.title: Love Jergens.
reviews.review_text: I've used Jergens lotions for over 10 years. My daughter likes the coconut one. She likes the smell and feel. She stays moisturized.

reviews.review_text: This lotion is like a spa day in a bottle. Absorbs fast, smells amazing without being overpowering, and leaves my skin feeling soft all day. I keep it on my nightstand, desk, and in my bag â€” basically, I'm obsessed.

reviews.title: Great lotion for SHINGLES.
reviews.review_text: I had a long, lingering case of Shingles on my hand. Had tried OTC items, herbal remedies %26 even Enu Oil (helped but NO CURE%26@ $30/pr 2oz, it shd've). I'm severely allergic to most lotions %26 creams, so I have to be really careful. I was given this as a gift %26 had NOT even opened the bottle. I gave it a try %26 to my amazement, the 1st day the redness started going away, the 2nd day,redness was gone. The 3rd day there was no pain or itching. The 4th day, my skin looked almost perfect %26 the 5th day, the Shingles was completely gone. It worked "MIRACLES" on my SHINGLES %26 I hope this "Jergens oil infused hydrating COCONUT with Coconut Oil %26 Coconut Water, 24 hour moisturizer",does the same for you. Be careful, Jergens makes several different Coconut lotions. Make sure you buy this particular one, ONLY.

Jergens Hydrating Coconut Body Lotion is a game-changer for anyone dealing with dry skin. With its rich blend of coconut oil and water, it provides deep hydration that leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized for hours. The texture is lightweight and non-greasy, which makes it easy to apply and absorb quickly, perfect for daily use. The subtle coconut scent is refreshing but not overpowering, giving a pleasant tropical feel without being too strong. I also love that it's dermatologist-tested, which reassures me about its quality and suitability for sensitive skin. The 16.8 oz bottle is generously sized and lasts a long time, offering great value. After just a few uses, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin's textureâ€”no more dry patches! This lotion is especially good during colder months when my skin tends to dry out more. Overall, Jergens Hydrating Coconut Body Lotion delivers on its promise of hydrating and nourishing the skin, and I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable solution to combat dryness.

reviews.title: I hated to give it up!
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to lotion. It lasts all day and has a wonderful smell. I ordered this because I had used all of my first bottle and then gave this bottle to my daughter because I was trying a different lotion and was actually kind of sad when I gave it up lol.

reviews.title: Will not use anything else
reviews.review_text: I have been using Jergens for 10 plus years. I've tried many different lotions due to severely dry skin. I will never use anything else now. It isn't runny like some lotions or overly thick. The coconut has a nice smell to it as well. I have one for work and one for at home

reviews.review_text: This lotion was awful doesn't smell like coconut at all smells like a big bottle of stinky perfume if I wanted to wear perfume I would buy perfume lotion shouldn't smell like this I returned it

reviews.title: Fabulous, like a day on the beach!
reviews.review_text: This lotion smells fantastic! It reminds me of my beach days in Puerto Rico because it slightly smells like Coopertone. I love the fragrance and the fact that it's absorbs quickly by the skin, so there's no greasy residue. Get it!
the smell is so fresh and jergens isnt sticky, feels like it soaks in instead of like you just put on wax gloves. yes its full of chemicals, no its not organic but its a great lotion for all over.

reviews.title: Not doing it
reviews.review_text: I used to use "Ultra Healing" and loved it! This time decided to "change" to "Hydrating Coconut" and regret it since. After putting on a generous amount (I use it on body only) it quickly feels that my skin is dry again. It even visibly shown dry , especially on my legs. However, when under the shower (wet), skin feels "slippery" as if I have oil on (which I do actually). My family members, who tried it, feel the same way too. So, I'll go back to my previous product and will put this one in guest bathroom for hands moisturizing after washing. Thank you.

reviews.title: Great scent and Not slimy
reviews.review_text: This is the greatest Jergens lotion I've used besides the Natural Glow! It has the most wonderful warm coconut scent, but it doesn't assault the senses- it's light. I absolutely love it! And furthermore, it absorbs so nicely into my skin; it's not oily or slimy and soaks right in to make my skin feel perfectly moisturized.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: I'm fair skinned and very sensitive to EVERYTHING. Winter kills my skin, but I saw the commercials, and I've always loved Jergens products. This moisturizer actually moisturizes my skin. I've only used it on my hands, it's not greasy, and it stays put until I wash hands or dishes again. I adore coconut scent, and this coconut is just right. Euphoric but not too strong. So glad I got a big bottle!

reviews.title: Very hydrating hours later
reviews.review_text: I intend to keep buying this product, very hydrating throughout the day [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
